snippet: Peter Laviolette, who led the Philadelphia Flyers to the Stanley Cup finals in 2010, agreed to a two-year contract extension that will take him through the 2014-15 season.
abstract: Philadelphia Flyers coach Peter Laviolette, who led the Flyers to the Stanley Cup finals in 2010, agrees to a two-year contract extension that will take him through the 2014-15 season.
lead_paragraph: Peter Laviolette, who led the Philadelphia Flyers to the Stanley Cup finals in 2010, agreed to a two-year contract extension that will take him through the 2014-15 season.
